title: 'It is an old stock'
body: 'Fabric is not as good as earlier. It has some holes at stitches. Time to look for other brands over jockey. For this price we can have atleast 3 shirts on the road side which are giving more life than jockey.'

title: 'comfortable to wear but it looses colour after each wash'
body: 'comfortable to wear but it looses colour after each wash .'

title: 'Olive green is dull and size is big'
body: 'Cloth quality is fine but Color of olive green is very dull and I ordered M size but it feel like L. Returned it.'

title: 'Fabric quality.'
body: 'Very good quality of fabric good design and fitting.'

title: 'Perfect.'
body: 'Got perfect size and color. Good quality too.'

title: 'The elastic at the waist is very tight.'
'Jockey loyalist appreciating the products'
body: 'It is since 2016/17 or so that we as a family have been using Jockey products. Always good to touch and feel. Always the product of choice. Always available whether a brick and mortar store or online. Everytime I purchased for my whole family the durability and longevity was surprising. The one I purchased through AMAZON this time is the 3rd shorts I have been using. The earlier 2 purchased in 2017/18 is still in use. Rarely do you see such a great combination of good quality products at such reasonable prices. Its green and super green all the way for Jockey.'

title: 'Very Comfortable'
body: 'It’s very comfortable to wear. Fabric is very soft. And the delivery was really fast.. Must buy if you are looking for comfortable leisure wear.'

title: 'Comfortable shorts'
body: 'These are very comfortable and made of Cotton breathable and soft material . A good one from jockey .'

title: 'Great product'
body: 'Pure cotton best quality comfortable A little high price'

title: 'Excellent product'
body: 'Been buying the same product multiple times can expect standard quality like most jockey products. Good quality and durable for workouts and regular wear. Highly recommended.'

title: 'Comfortable fabric & fits well'
body: 'Nice fabric comfortable & most imp fits me'

title: 'Horrible'
body: I was cheated tag so can't even return it...this was the worst exp

title: 'Comfortable'
body: 'They are very comfortable n sturdy buying it for second time'

title: 'Great quality
body: '5.0 out of 5 stars''The product is as described perfect for me and great quality!'

title: 'Fell in love'
body: 'Exactly what i was looking for. if you are low waist wearing person than these will be at knee level. I am a tall one at 6\'2" with an athletic build. Good for day use or gonig about in the Gym park and excersize. Material is soft cotton and absords sweat easily.'

title: 'Worst quality'
body: 'Quality is worst I think they selling copy jockey products'

title: 'Ok ok product'
body: 'Its ok product.. better than local pants.. but not like Vanheusen pants I am wearing right now.'

title: 'Excellent product'
body: 'Excellent product and nice look. Thank you jockey for providing such a nice product with good price.'

title: 'Very good and comfortable wear.'
body: 'A very good fit and a comfortable and soft wear'

title: 'Length is a bit more than expected'
body: 'Returned only because the length is too long. I am 5’11” and it goes beyond the knees.'

title: 'One of the worst product on Amazon'
body: 'The fabric is so delicate that after wearing it is sure to get torn. The shorts are made of paper.'

title: 'perfect as expected.'
body: 'Size fitting material and pricing everything is worth it. a must buy for summers and for anyone who likes to workout or just want to wear it at home its a go for.'

title: 'Cool one!!'
body: Don't look at the price. Buy it you won't regret. Quality is superb. No irritation in wearing it. And will last long. Best than normal cheap shorts.

title: 'Very comfortable...'
body: 'Material is very good. Fits very well...'
